def_cn: 难以抑制的;不能自拔的
def_en: You use compulsive to describe people or their behaviour when they cannot stop doing something wrong, harmful, or unnecessary.

def_cn: (书或电视节目)吸引人的，有趣的，引人入胜的
def_en: If a book or television programme is compulsive, it is so interesting that you do not want to stop reading or watching it.
